entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
